name: NicheRadio
0:
”Alexa, ask niche radio to play the sixties”
”Alexa, open niche radio and listen to soul ”
”Alexa, run niche radio and listen to pop party”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: niche radio
des:
About Us
24-7 Niche Radio is a hobby which we started in March 2012.

Our Mission is to provide you with a large selection of stations which are non-commercial, non-profitable with no interruptions.


HOW TO USE:
1. Enable the skill via Amazon account that is also linked to your Echo device
2. Run the skill by saying: Alexa, open niche radio
3. You can now listen to your favorite radio stations or you can listen to a random radio station. Here are some sample phrases you could try:

listen to dreamboats and petticoats
play my radio
play soul

These are currently the available radio stations:
- Dreamboats and Petticoats
- Motown
- Decades
- Rock and Roll
- Romance
- Psychedelic
- Legends
- Just Rock
- Classic Rock
- Disco
- Reggae
- Serene
- The '60s
- Northern Soul
- Pop Party
- Hot Country
- The '70s
- The '80s
- Smooth Jazz
- Dance Rock
- Soul
- Punk


To contact us, you can send us an email on nicheradio247@gmail.com. You can also visit our website on 24-7nicheradio.com or our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/24niche.radio. 



For future Alexa development requests, you can reach out to Kia Somabes (kia.somabes@gmail.com).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
